item.title: Binance Pay Lights Up French Riviera: 80+ Merchants Now Take Stablecoins Instantly
item.description:
Crypto adoption has reached the French Riviera, with more than 80 merchants across the area now accepting stablecoins and cryptocurrency payments, following a new partnership between Binance Pay and French fintech firm Lyzi.The initiative, which spans cities including Cannes, Nice, Antibes, and Monaco, marks one of the most expansive real-world deployments of crypto payments in […]

item.title: Ripple Applies for US Banking License – Could Federal Oversight Supercharge Its Stablecoin RLUSD?
item.description:
Ripple has filed with the U.S. Comptroller of the Currency for a national banking license, bringing RLUSD under federal and New York oversight, granting direct Fed payment access, and positioning the firm as Congress finalizes strict stablecoin rules.

The post Ripple Applies for US Banking License – Could Federal Oversight Supercharge Its Stablecoin RLUSD? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Algorand Dominates 70% of RWA Market as Stablecoins Surge 137% – Can ALGO Hit $0.20?
item.description:
Algorand has consolidated a 70% grip on the $24.3bn real-world asset sector, recording $268.2 m in tokenized value. Messari reports Q1 stablecoin capital on the chain has risen 137% to $135m, led by USDC, while new staking rewards have drawn more than two billion ALGO out of circulation.

The post Algorand Dominates 70% of RWA Market as Stablecoins Surge 137% – Can ALGO Hit $0.20? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs, SBF’s Former Jailmate, Acquitted On Most Serious Charges
item.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs has been acquitted of racketeering and sex-trafficking in Manhattan court while convicted on prostitution charges connected to Cassie Ventura. The rapper, once housed alongside Sam Bankman-Fried at MDC, now faces sentencing guidelines that could keep additional prison time to a minimum.

 

The post Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs, SBF’s Former Jailmate, Acquitted On Most Serious Charges appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: ChatGPT Predicts XRP, Pepe and Dogecoin Prices by End of 2025
item.description:
ChatGPT has pointed to a late-2025 crypto upturn, projecting Bitcoin’s renewed advance toward its May peak and substantial upside for XRP, PEPE, DOGE and presale Layer-2 HYPER. The forecast rests on completed SEC litigation, emerging technical breakouts and calmer global risk sentiment.

item.title: PENGU Memecoin Nets 850M Daily Views – Will a $0.02 Breakout Mirror PEPE’s Explosion?
item.description:
PENGU memecoin has rebounded 49% this week, retaking the $0.0165 zone after breaking a descending channel. Viral GIF traffic, new Binance, Coinbase, and OKX listings, and analyst views likening its setup to PEPE have strengthened expectations of a test toward $0.02.

item.title: ChatGPT’s 42-Signal TRX Analysis Flags Corporate Treasury Milestone
item.description:
ChatGPT has combined 42 real-time indicators with SRM Entertainment’s $100 M TRX treasury strategy to assess TRON’s 90-day outlook. Price action above the 20-, 50-, 100- and 200-day EMAs, healthy RSI, and expanding corporate staking have supported a structurally bullish trend and steady liquidity.

item.title: Trump Family Rakes In $620M+ From Crypto: Meme coin Windfall, Token Sales, and a 20% Bitcoin Stake
item.description:
The Trump Family has shifted wealth toward crypto. Bloomberg has estimated over $620 million in earnings via World Liberty Financial, the $TRUMP token and mining stakes, cutting real estate to half of Donald Trump’s net worth and widening exposure to Bitcoin, ETFs and stablecoin initiatives.

item.title: SkyBridge Capital’s Scaramucci Warns Crypto Treasury Craze Will Fade, Despite Saylor Effect
item.description:
SkyBridge Capital’s Anthony Scaramucci has cautioned that the rush of firms adopting crypto treasury strategies will fade. He questions paying a premium when assets can be bought directly and notes imitators such as BitMine and Metaplanet must justify cost structures as oversight evolves.
